reviewText: Informative biography. I bought this for family members who are related to Daniel Boone and we all enjoyed watching it.

This is a pretty decent biography, for its length. Using the guidelines for stars, I don't "love it" because it would need to be a couple hours to make me that happy with it. This review is subjective, of course. My standards are fairly high for this particular subject because I am related to Boone and I want to know more about him.
